Sentencas: Creep properties of sandwich joint specimens made of a newly developed BaO-B2O3-Al2O3-SiO2 glass-ceramic sealant (GC-9) and a ferritic-stainless-steel interconnect (Crofer 22 H) for planar solid oxide fuel cells (pSOFCs) are investigated at 800 degrees C under constant shear and tensile loadings.
Titulo: Creep rupture of the joint of a solid oxide fuel cell glass-ceramic sealant with metallic interconnect

Sentencas: The creep rupture time of Crofer 22 H/GC-9/Crofer 22 H joint specimens is increased with a decrease in applied load for both shear and tensile loading modes.
Titulo: Creep rupture of the joint of a solid oxide fuel cell glass-ceramic sealant with metallic interconnect

Sentencas: The given metal/sealant/metal joint has a greater degradation of joint strength at 800 degrees C under prolonged, constant tensile loading as compared to shear loading.
Titulo: Creep rupture of the joint of a solid oxide fuel cell glass-ceramic sealant with metallic interconnect

Sentencas: The tensile creep strength at a rupture time of 1000 h is about 9% of the average tensile joint strength, while the shear creep strength at 1000 h is about 23% of the average shear joint strength.
Titulo: Creep rupture of the joint of a solid oxide fuel cell glass-ceramic sealant with metallic interconnect

Sentencas: Failure patterns of both shear and tensile joint specimens are similar regardless of the creep rupture time.
Titulo: Creep rupture of the joint of a solid oxide fuel cell glass-ceramic sealant with metallic interconnect

Sentencas: In general, creep cracks initiate at the interface between the (Cr,Mn)(3)O-4 spinel layer and the BaCrO4 chromate layer, penetrate through the BaCrO4 layer, and propagate along the interface between the chromate layer and glass-ceramic substrate until final fracture.
Titulo: Creep rupture of the joint of a solid oxide fuel cell glass-ceramic sealant with metallic interconnect

Sentencas: Final, fast fracture occasionally takes place within the glass-ceramic layer.
Titulo: Creep rupture of the joint of a solid oxide fuel cell glass-ceramic sealant with metallic interconnect
